description_top_view: Web3 and the future of social good Thank you for your support. This is an invitation to membership program limited for RE: NFT holder. You can view special content and participate in the event. With community members, let's create a new form of social contribution.
enter_verification_code: Enter verification code received by email
already_used_body: The verification code is already used. Please proceed to sign in.
enter_valid_code: Please enter valid verification code received by email.
valid_verification_code_body: Your qualification is confirmed. Please sign-in.
section_above: RE:VISION NFT holders can participate in a community for refugee support x NFT. In the community, we will collaborate with refugee artists and also share information on new NFT works and invite you to webinars and several events.
section_bellow: Join Our Community Donations are not the only way to contribute to society. Through continuous communication, we can deepen your understanding of social issues, also you can give your opinion on the support destination and the project concept. Activities for a better future can be more fun, and more diverse.
